name: Donkey Me
description: Donkey Me is a 2D arcade, single-screen platform game based on Donkey Kong. The main hero must rescue a girl or someone else. Starting at the bottom of the level he needs to jumps over enemies, barrels and rocks, collect various weapons to attack automatically, climb ladders etc. If he rescues the girl, a next, harder level is started. The game has many skins, made with the others indie developers and also based on movies such as Gremlins. The default skin is based on Indiana Jones.
